sentences.sentence: Mandy handed him a fistful of coins.
It really stands a good chance of winning a fistful of Tony Awards in a few months.
sentences.translation: 绝对有实力在几个月后的托尼奖【3】评选中成为大赢家。

sentences.sentence: As I was speaking, somebody started passing a hat along the bar, and before I knew it, I was handed a fistful of cash, nearly $500.
sentences.translation: 我一边讲着，一边有人在沿着吧台传递一顶帽子，而在我没有发现的时候，有人给了我一大把现金，总共约500美元。
